products.title: Bespoke Cut - Up to 20M Super Length Continuous Run LED COB Strip IP44 8W 3000K Warm White Warm White 3000K / 5.50 Metre - Uno Lighting
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com             


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB strip.  Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk. Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW. 

 8W per Meter, IP44, 3000K Warm Whtie, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips 


 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Warm White 2700K, 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6000K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately). 

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip. 

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 


 


 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. Given the bespoke nature, it may take 3 - 5 working days to prepare the cuts. In case of numerous cuts or potential delays, customers will be notified of any extended preparation times and the expected shipping date.

IP44 COB Strip Installation Caution: All Bespoke strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP44, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

Upon placing the order, the buyer affirms that the product specifications align with their requirements. Uno Lighting, as the seller, disclaims any responsibility for products not meeting customer requirements once the order has been placed.

products.title: 3W Mia Round Low Level Wash Recessed Step, Stair Light White (Non Dimmable Driver Included) 3W 4000K Round White
products.description:
This fitting is supplied with a pre-wired inline waterproof driver that fits easily through the cutout hole for simple installation.

 The 3W Round LED Low-Level Wash Recessed Step / Stair / Brick Light in Matt White provides a subtle and elegant lighting solution. Featuring a Warm White 3000K output, it delivers a soft, indirect glow that enhances visibility and ambience.

 Its slim profile design makes it perfect for modern interiors, while the optional embedded sleeve (sold separately) is recommended for installations in brick or solid walls.

 This light is ideal for stairs, corridors, hallways, and pathways, offering both functionality and architectural style. It provides anti-glare illumination that gently lights the area without being harsh on the eyes.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Colour Temperature: 3000K Warm White

  
 *  Light Output: 50 lumens

  
 *  Cutout: Ø35mm

  
 *  Front Bezel: Ø45mm

  
 *  Beam: Low-level wash light effect

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor and semi-protected areas

  
 *  CRI: 90 – high colour accuracy

  
 *  Anti-Glare Design

  
 *  Slim Profile

  
 *  Optional Embedded Sleeve available (sold separately)

  
 *  Dimmable Option: Works with compatible dimmable driver (sold separately)

   Applications:
Ideal for stairs, hallways, walkways, and circulation areas, helping guide movement safely when overhead lights are off. Also suitable for use as a decorative or architectural feature light.

 Installation Notes:
Supplied with a pre-wired inline waterproof driver that fits through the cutout hole.
For outdoor or brick installations, use a waterproof enclosure or embedded sleeve.
Installation should be performed by a qualified electrician.

products.title: 20 Metre Reel 8W 6000K Day Light Super Length 20 Metre Continuous Run LED COB Strip IP44 6000K Daylight 20M - Uno Lighting
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com 


 Product Overview
8W per meter | IP44 | 384 LEDs/m | 20-Meter Reel | 24V | Super Bright LED Strip | 720lm/m | CRI 90
Dimensions: 10mm × 20000mm
Colour Temperature: 6000K Day Light
•    Super Long 20-Meter Reel with Built-in IC — supports up to 20 meters continuous run with almost no voltage drop.
•    Only one-end power input required for up to 20m continuous installation.
•    Provides linear, flicker-free light with no dark spots or short-circuit risk.
•    Compatible with all 24V constant drivers and supports PWM dimming.
•    Seamless, dot-free illumination from high-density LED chips (invisible chip design).
•    Premium commercial-grade LED strip, perfect for professional installations.



 Installation & Usage Notes
•    Maximum continuous run: 20 meters to prevent voltage drop and premature failure.
•    IP44 rating: For indoor use only; not suitable for outdoor or wet environments.
•    Supplied without a plug: Ready for connection or hardwiring by a qualified professional.
•    Handle with care: Avoid bending or pressing on the strip during installation — physical damage may void the warranty.

 Terms & Conditions
•    All strips are tested before dispatch.
•    This IP44 strip is not waterproof; handle gently to avoid damage.
•    Maximum continuous run should not exceed 20 meters when connected in longer runs.
•    By placing an order, the buyer confirms that product specifications meet their requirements.

products.title: 2 Gang 2 Way Toggle Light Switch Matt Black Toggle with Brushed Brass / Matte Gold Plate Finish
products.description:
Add a touch of elegance to your home with our 2 Gang 2 Way Toggle Light Switch featuring a Matt Black Toggle with French Brass / Matt Gold Plate Finish.

 Beautifully crafted, this switch combines a sleek black toggle with a luxurious brushed brass and matte gold plate, creating a timeless and sophisticated look. Its modern rectangular design complements any interior style — from contemporary to classic.

 Built for durability and performance, it allows control of two lighting circuits from different locations. Made from high-quality stainless steel, it ensures long-lasting reliability with a 250V / 10A capacity.

 Product Specification:

 Dimension: L90 × W86 × D31mm

 Toggle Length: 9.5mm (Fits standard 25mm back box)

 Material: Stainless Steel

 Rated Current: 10A

 Rated Voltage: 220–250V

 Finish: Matt Black Toggle with French Brass / Matt Gold Plate

products.title: Screwless Brushed Brass / Matt Gold Switched Single Plug Socket 1 Gang 13 Amp DP
products.description:
Elevate the sophistication of your living space with our French Brushed Brass/Matt Gold 3 Pin Single Switched Socket Exclusive to Uno Lighting. Crafted with precision and attention to detail, this switch seamlessly combines functionality with an elegant design.

 The socket features a stunning French Brass Bass finish combined with a matte gold touch, adding a touch of luxury to any room. Its rectangular shape not only enhances aesthetics but also offers a modern and sleek appearance.

 Designed for versatility, this socket operates as a single socket with a robust 220-250V/13A capacity, it ensures reliable performance and durability.

 Upgrade your interior with this stylish yet functional switch that harmoniously blends aesthetics and practicality. Experience the epitome of quality craftsmanship and design with our French Brass Bass/Matt Gold switched socket.

 Product Specification: 

 Dimension: L90*W86*D30mm (Can fit into standard 25mm Back Box)


 Material: Stainless Stainless Steel, Brass

 Rated Current: 13A

 Rated Voltage: 220-250V

products.title: 3W Chloe Fluted Marker Light, CCT Mini Downlight, Niche/Alcove/Soffit Light Copper (Non Dimmable Driver Included) Copper Bezel / *Single Colour (Very
products.description:
Please note these finishes are manufactured to order and have a 3–5 day lead time. As these items are made to order, they are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

  

 This fitting is supplied with a pre-wired inline waterproof driver that fits through the cutout hole for easy installation.

 The Premium 3W Chloe Fluted Marker Light / Mini Downlight in Copper finish features an inline CCT colour-switchable connector, allowing you to select between Warm White (2800K), Cool White (4000K), and Daylight (6000K). Designed with a fluted anti-glare bezel and faceted lens, this stylish IP44-rated fitting offers soft, glare-free illumination — a great MR11 alternative for modern interiors.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Light Output: 300 lumens

  
 *  Colour Temperature: Switchable (2800K / 4000K / 6000K)

  
 *  Beam Angle: 30° (low-glare fluted design)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor use

  
 *  Bezel Finish: Copper

  
 *  Driver: Pre-wired inline waterproof driver (fits through cutout hole)

  
 *  Dimmable option available (requires compatible dimmable driver)

   Applications:
Perfect for kitchens (as plinth lights), receptions, meeting rooms, entrance foyers, niches, soffits, and cabinet lighting.

 Dimensions:

  
 *  Cutout: Ø37mm

  
 *  Height: 34mm

  
 *  Front Bezel: Ø45mm

   Installation Notes:
The inline waterproof driver fits easily through the cutout hole for convenient setup.
For use in humid or semi-outdoor areas, the driver must be housed in a waterproof enclosure.
To enable dimming, replace the supplied driver with a compatible dimmable driver.
Installation should be carried out by a qualified professional.

products.title: 40 Meter Reel COB LED Strip Lights IP44 8W 3000K Warm White Lighting for Home Decor - Easy Install Flexible Dotless Tape Light - 20m Continuous
products.description: Illuminating your space with effortless brilliance, this 40 Metre Reel Super Length LED COB Strip delivers an impressive 20 Metres Continuous Run, perfect for creating a seamless and sophisticated lighting ambiance. Boasting an IP44 rating, this strip is designed to withstand moisture and dust, making it an ideal choice for a wide range of applications, from accent lighting in kitchens and bathrooms to enhancing outdoor living areas and architectural features. The advanced COB (Chip-on-Board) technology ensures a remarkably uniform and dot-free light output, mimicking the smooth glow of traditional lighting while offering the superior efficiency and longevity of LED. With a power consumption of just 8 Watts per metre, this strip is incredibly energy-efficient, helping to reduce your electricity bills without compromising on brightness. The warm white color temperature of 3000K casts a cozy and inviting glow, fostering a relaxed and comfortable atmosphere that is perfect for both residential and commercial settings. This generous 40-metre reel provides ample length for extensive installations, minimizing the need for multiple joins and ensuring a clean, uninterrupted aesthetic. Its flexible design allows for easy bending and shaping around corners and contours, offering unparalleled versatility in installation. The strip is also dimmable when used with compatible dimmers and power supplies, allowing you to precisely control the brightness and mood of your environment. Each metre of this LED strip contains a high density of LED chips, contributing to its exceptional light quality and diffused illumination, eliminating harsh shadows and hot spots. The simple plug-and-play connectivity, assuming the correct power supply and connectors are used, makes installation straightforward for both DIY enthusiasts and professional installers. Experience a superior lighting solution that combines cutting-edge technology, remarkable flexibility, and long-lasting performance with this exceptional warm white LED COB strip. Its ability to create a continuous wash of light across significant distances makes it a premier choice for large-scale projects and intricate designs alike, transforming any space with its gentle yet impactful illumination. The reliable performance and durable construction of this LED strip ensure it will be a valuable addition to your lighting repertoire for years to come.

products.title: 5W Garden Outdoor LED Spike Lights IP65 with 1.5 Meters Cable 4000K Cool White
products.description: This 5W small but might integrated 240v LED spike light packs a punch! Available in 3000K Warm White, 4000K Cool White. Its small and discreet physical size makes it an ideal spike light, as it is easy to hide amongst plants or to fit in a plant pot. Utilizing world leading LED chip manufacturer 'CREE' technology, this 5w spike light gives output to 475 lumens, which provides an excellent level of energy efficiency at 95 lumens per watt (95 lm/w). Its powerful light output creates a very effective architectural style of illumination for plants, flowers, trees, walls, architectural features, etc. This fitting has a built in LED driver so no external driver is required, meaning no hassle of hiding external drivers in waterproof enclosures and no additional outdoor connections will need to be made or managed apart from connecting the cable directly to the mains. This light is pre-wired with a 2 meters cable to make the difficult job of managing outdoor connections much easier, and allows the installer to daisy-chain fittings on a circuit, if they wish to do so. This fitting is manufacturer from a high quality die-cast aluminum for great durability, and is finished in a black weatherproof coating, and is rated at IP65 on the ingress protection table making is watertight. This fitting is supplied with both a wall/post/bollard mounting bracket and an in-ground spike to allow the installer to use one fitting across a landscaping project, for a sense of uniformity in design (allen key included). The specialized bracket design allows the fitting to be vertically position in any direction, so it can swing a full 360°. This fittings has been manufactured to endure harsh weather condition and can operate in temperatures -20° to +55°. Available in a 3000k warm white or 4500k cool white, this fitting can really enhance any any landscaping project. Supplied with a 1 years manufacturers warranty, for peace of mind.

products.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 3000K Warm White / No - IP20 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

products.title: 3W Mini Dark Bronze LED IP44 Marker Light, Small Downlight/Spotlight, Niche/Alcove/Soffit Light Low Glare (Driver included)/3000K Chloe
products.description: 3W Mini Dark Bronze LED IP44 Marker Light, Small Downlight/Spotlight, Niche/Alcove/Soffit Light Low Glare (Driver included)/3000K Chloe - Experience the perfect blend of style and functionality with this exquisite 3W Chloe marker light. This compact powerhouse, boasting a stunning smoky dark bronze bezel, seamlessly integrates into any modern or traditional setting. Its fluted, anti-glare bezel not only enhances its aesthetic appeal but also minimizes harsh glare, creating a warm and inviting ambiance. The faceted lens further refines the light distribution, providing a soft, diffused illumination perfect for highlighting architectural features or adding a touch of elegance to any space. Designed with convenience in mind, this mini downlight comes pre-wired with an inline waterproof driver, simplifying installation and eliminating the need for separate wiring. The driver conveniently fits through the 37mm cutout, ensuring a clean and professional finish. This exceptional light offers incredible versatility; use it as a plinth light in your kitchen to add a touch of subtle brilliance to your counter space, in reception areas and meeting rooms for elegant functional illumination or discreetly placed in niche, soffit or cabinet lighting to subtly highlight shelves or collections. The impressive 300 lumens provide ample brightness without overwhelming the surrounding area while the 30-degree beam angle concentrates the light for targeted illumination. Beyond its aesthetic qualities, this LED marker light prioritizes energy efficiency, and its low-glare design prevents eye strain, ensuring maximum visual comfort. Furthermore, this model offers a unique colour-changing feature via an inline colour-switching connector allowing selection from a range of colour temperatures – choose from warm white (2800K) to create a cozy, inviting feel, cool white (4000K) for a more crisp and vibrant ambiance or even a bright daylight (6000K) to ensure task-orientated light levels if desired. The compact dimensions are carefully designed for a perfect fit: a 37mm cutout diameter, 34mm height and a 45mm front bezel ensure it sits unobtrusively in your chosen location. Upgrade your lighting and enhance your interior with this stylish and efficient mini downlight; an ideal and stylish replacement for traditional MR11 fixtures. Moreover, this versatile and adaptable marker light, rated at IP44 for water splash protection, enhances not only the look of a room but is durable enough for installation in areas prone to moisture. For those who require even finer control, a dimmable driver option allows for complete customization to your environment's exact lighting requirements. With its compact design, remarkable features, and adaptability this sophisticated Chloe marker light adds more than just illumination; it elevates the style and ambience of any space you choose to highlight. This truly is the ultimate choice for both style and sophistication.

products.description:
*Please be advised that the delivery time for this item is estimated to be between 2 to 3 days. In the event that this item is ordered alongside other items, this item may be delivered 1 to 2 days after the other items have been received, despite all items being dispatched simultaneously.

 5 PACK of 2 METERS Silver Deep Recessed Profile with Frosted Cover. Each Profile come with 2 End Caps, 4 Mounted Clips. Milky Deep Recessed Aluminum Extrusion, Suitable to housing Single Colour & RGB Strip to act as a heat sink to maintain LED Strip. (Noted: Make sure that the width of your LED strips and strip-connector is less than 12mm). DEEP PROFILE- Up to 15mm in Height Dimension: Height-15mm, Inner width-12mm. PROTECTION- Great Heat dissipation produced by LEDs, but the cover protects the LEDs from exposure to dust, hair, and physical contact. COVER- Milky white cover diffuses LED strip lights, rending a softer, more uniform light, ideal for decorative and accent lighting. EASY INSTALLATION- Can be cut and customized to suit any project. Simply stick the LED strip light's adhesive backing inside the aluminum channel, snap on the diffuser cover. PACKAGE- is 5 Pack of 5 Meters LED Strip Aluminum Deep Recessed Channel/extrusions/profiles/track come with 5 Pack of 2 Meters Milky diffuser covers, 10pcs end caps, 20pcs mounting clips; Each segment is 2M(6.56ft), total length is 10 meters.

products.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 2700K Very Warm White / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

products.title: 4 Gang 2 Way Toggle Light Switch Black Toggle Brushed Brass / Matt Gold Plate Finish
products.description:
Add a touch of timeless elegance to your interior with our 4 Gang 2 Way Toggle Light Switch in Black Toggle with French Brushed Brass / Matt Gold Plate Finish. Expertly crafted for style and durability, this switch brings together modern design and premium quality.

 The matte black toggles contrast beautifully with the French brushed brass plate, creating a luxurious look that suits both contemporary and classic interiors. Its sleek rectangular design enhances any room, making it ideal for living rooms, bedrooms, hallways, or offices.

 Designed for convenience, this 4 Gang 2 Way switch allows flexible lighting control from multiple points. Built from high-quality stainless steel, it ensures dependable performance and long-lasting durability.

 Product Specification:

 Dimension: L146 × W90 × D31mm

 Toggle Length: 9.5mm (Fits standard 25mm Back Box)

 Material: Stainless Steel

 Rated Current: 10A

 Rated Voltage: 220–250V

 Finish: Black Toggle with French Brushed Brass / Matt Gold Plate

products.title: 60W Marker Light Dimmable Driver Series Wired for Clara, Sofia, MAYA, MIA, Chloe & Ella
products.description:
60W Constant Current Dimmable Driver (Triac/Phase Dimming)

 This 60W IP20 constant current dimmable driver is designed for indoor applications and is fully compatible with our Clara, Sofia, Maya, Mia, Chloe, and Ella marker light ranges. It offers multiple selectable output currents (600mA–2100mA) via a convenient DIP switch, allowing flexibility for different lighting setups.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Input Voltage: 200–240V AC

  
 *  Output Current: 600mA–2100mA (selectable via DIP switch)

  
 *  Dimming: Works with leading and trailing-edge Triac/Phase cut dimmers

  
 *  Protection: Short circuit, overload, and overcurrent protection

  
 *  Cooling: Free air convection

  
 *  Housing: Durable, fully enclosed plastic casing for safe and easy installation

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 (indoor use only)

  
 *  Size: 192.5 × 62 × 24 mm

   Installation Notes:

  
 *  Remove the supplied non-dimmable driver before installation.

  
 *  Lights must be wired in series (NOT parallel).

  
 *  For best dimming results, maintain a circuit load between 20% and 80% of total capacity.

  
 *  Installation should only be carried out by a qualified electrician.

products.title: Bespoke Cut - Up To 20m Super Length Continuous Run Led Cob Strip Ip44 8w 6500k Day Light 6500k Day Light / 17.00 Metre
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com             


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB 6500K Day Light strip.  Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk. Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW.  


 8W per Meter, IP44, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips

 
 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Very Warm White 2700K, Warm White 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6500K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately). 

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

  Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip. 

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 


 


 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. Given the bespoke nature, it may take 3 - 5 working days to prepare the cuts. In case of numerous cuts or potential delays, customers will be notified of any extended preparation times and the expected shipping date.

IP44 COB Strip Installation Caution: All Bespoke strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP44, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

products.description:
3W Low Glare High Power Marker Light / Mini Downlight – Indirect Up/Down Bezel

 This premium 3W low glare mini downlight / marker light comes with an Indirect Up/Down bezel finished in Brushed Satin Nickel. Pre-wired with an individual non-dimmable driver, and available in 3000K Warm White or 4000K Cool White LED options.

products.title: 1 - 10 Metre Extension/Bridge/Gap connector for 10mm Dotless COB Strip LED Single Color Strip IP44 Double End Connectors / 3.00 Metre - Uno Lighting
products.description:
1 - 10 Metre Extension/Bridge/Gap connector for 10mm Dotless COB Strip LED Single Color Strip IP44.

  Only suitable for the below type of LED strip (all requirements must be met):

  
 * Dotless LED Strip 
 * 10mm 
 * IP44 
 * Single Colour (2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K)  The cable can be shortened by simply pulling a connector off the end and cutting down the cable, and reinserting the cable to the removed connector.

 This connector can be used as a single end connector too. allowing the  creation of a longer cable to make an initial connections to our Dotless COB 10mm IP44 LED strip. In order use this connector as a single end you can simply pull off one connector.

products.title: 3W Mini Matt Gold LED IP44 Marker Light, Small Downlight/Spotlight, Niche/Alcove/Soffit Light Low Glare (Driver included) / 4000K Chloe
products.description:
This fitting is supplied with a pre-wired inline waterproof driver that fits through the cutout hole for easy installation.

 The Premium 3W Chloe Fluted Marker Light / Mini Downlight is finished in elegant Satin Brushed Brass / Matt Gold and features a CCT colour-switchable connector, allowing you to select between Warm White (2800K), Cool White (4000K), and Daylight (6000K).

 Designed with a fluted anti-glare bezel and faceted lens, this light delivers soft, glare-free illumination with a stylish appearance — an ideal MR11 alternative for high-end interiors.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Light Output: 300 lumens

  
 *  Colour Temperature: Switchable (2800K / 4000K / 6000K)

  
 *  Beam Angle: 30° (low-glare fluted design)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor use

  
 *  Bezel Finish: Satin Brushed Brass / Matt Gold

  
 *  Driver: Pre-wired inline waterproof driver (fits through cutout hole)

  
 *  Dimmable option available (requires compatible dimmable driver)

   Applications:
Ideal for kitchens (as plinth lights), receptions, meeting rooms, entrance foyers, niches, soffits, and cabinet lighting.

 Dimensions:

  
 *  Cutout: Ø37mm

  
 *  Height: 34mm

  
 *  Front Bezel: Ø45mm

   Installation Notes:
The inline waterproof driver fits easily through the cutout hole for quick installation.
For use in humid or semi-outdoor areas, the driver must be housed in a waterproof enclosure.
To enable dimming, replace the supplied driver with a compatible dimmable driver.
Installation should always be completed by a qualified professional.

products.title: 5 x 2 Meters Trimless 12mm Wide Plaster-In Aluminum LED Profile Channel with Frosted Diffuser & Accessories for LED Strip Lighting
products.description:
12mm Wide LED Trimless Profile – 2 Metres

 Delivery Note: This item is usually delivered within 1–3 working days. If purchased with other products, it may arrive 1–2 days later than the rest of your order, even though everything is dispatched at the same time, this is due to the size of the package

 Our 12mm Wide LED Trimless Profile is the perfect solution for achieving a sleek, modern lighting design. It allows for seamless integration of LED strips, creating a clean, minimalist finish that enhances any interior.

 Made from durable 6063 aircraft-grade aluminium, this profile is strong and rigid, preventing bending or flexing during installation – unlike cheaper alternatives.

  
 *  Length: 2 metres (6.56 ft) 
 *  Width: 12 mm 
 *  Cover: Frosted/milky diffuser for a flush light finish 
 *  Accessories: Includes 2 end caps 
 *  Material: Extruded aluminium for strength and heat dissipation  Designed to be recessed into walls, ceilings, or other surfaces, the slim profile blends seamlessly into its surroundings, making the lighting appear as part of the architecture. It provides secure housing for LED strips, ensures proper heat management, and extends LED lifespan.

 Package Includes:

  
 * 1 × 2 metre aluminium profile/channel/extrusion 
 * 1 × 2 metre milky diffuser cover 
 * 2 × end caps

products.title: Darlene - E27 Jelly Pendant Art Deco and Classic Style with Simple Shape, Inviting Glass Expression, and Gracious Brass Top, Perfect for Dining Rooms
products.description:
Delivery - 3 - 5 working days delivery if in-stock with the manufacturer. For out of stock items the lead time will be provided upon ordering.

 Please note a 25% inspection and re-stocking fee on applies to returns on this product.

 All the unnecessary is removed in the Jelly pendant in favour of the simple shape and inviting expression the glass provides. Jelly consists of two layers of glass with the inner shade in white opal glass and the outer shade in clear glass, which gives the light a soft and warm glow. A small detail is the gracious brass top, which adds an exclusive expression to the lamp. Darlene is perfect above the dining table or to light up any corner that needs a little extra light.

The glass in this lamp is mouth-blown and has been individually hand crafted. Due to this unique process, air bubbles may appear in the glass and the thickness of the glass can also vary. This gives the glass its character and vivid appearance.

  
 * Socket type - E27 - not supplied with this fitting
  
 * IP Rating - IP20 
 * Maximum bulb wattage - 40W 
 * Class 2 (Double isolated) 
 * Dimmable - Yes, can be dimmed by choosing a bulb 
 * Length of the cable  - 200cm 
 * Height  - 22.8cm 
 * Width - 39cm 
 * Length - 39cm 
 * Canopy Dimension 12,5cm 
 * Shade Diameter - 39cm

 The 3W LED Low-Level Wash Recessed Step / Stair / Brick Light in Matt White is available in Warm White (3000K) and Cool White (4000K) colour temperatures. With its slim profile and anti-glare design, it provides a subtle and stylish lighting effect that enhances safety and ambience in circulation areas.

 Perfect for staircases, hallways, walkways, and corridors, this light gently illuminates pathways, helping users navigate safely when overhead lights are off. It can also serve as an architectural feature light, adding visual interest and soft mood lighting to modern interiors.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Colour Temperature: 3000K (Warm White) / 4000K (Cool White)

 *  Cutout: 35mm

  
 *  Bezel Dimensions: Height 45mm × Width 45mm

Ideal for steps, walls, corridors, hallways, and pathways, providing both functional and decorative lighting. Suitable for residential and commercial environments such as receptions, foyers, and staircases.

Supplied with a pre-wired inline non-dimmable through-hole driver that fits through the cutout hole.

products.description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

 8W per Meter, IP44, 3000K Warm Whtie, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips

products.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 3000K Warm White / No - IP20 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

products.title: Varilight KQP101W V-COM 10 - 100W LED Dimmer
products.description:
Product Description: 1-Gang 2-Way V-Com Push On/Off Rotary LED Dimmer 1 x 10-100W

 Dimensions: 85x85x47mm

 Faceplate Depth: 11mm

 Net Weight: 86g

 Gross Weight: 88g

 Fixing Centres: 60.3mm

 Depth from Mounting Face: 14.6mm

 Recommended Back Box Depth: 25mm

 Operating Voltage: 230v 50Hz

 Maximum Load Rating: LED;100W

 Maximum Current Rating: 0.4A

 Terminal (Live) Diameter: 3.2mm; Capacity: 3 x 1.5mm²

 Intended Applications: Indoor Use Only. Commercial & domestic lighting circuits including many dimmable LEDS.

 Safety Advice: Not suitable for use with non-dimmable fluorescent bulbs and tubes, wire-wound or toroidal transformers or electric motors. Do not overload.

products.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 6500K Day Light / No - IP20 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

products.title: Jocelyn E27 Bulb Clear
products.description:
Delivery - 3 - 5 working days delivery if in-stock with the manufacturer. For out of stock items the lead time will be provided upon ordering.

 Please note a 25% inspection and re-stocking fee on applies to returns on this product.

 The Jocelyn decorative bulb, designed with an E27 socket, seamlessly blends a classic aesthetic with the benefits of modern LED technology. This LED bulb is energy-efficient, long-lasting, and emits a very warm light.

 Unlike standard LED bulbs, the Jocelyn decorative bulb offers 360-degree illumination, whereas regular LED bulbs typically produce directional light.

 Additionally, the Jocelyn decorative bulb boasts an elegant design, making it a popular choice for situations where the bulb's appearance is an integral part of the overall lighting design.

 Socket type E27

 Dimmable? No


 Available in Very Warm white 2200K

 Lumen  200


 Primary material Glass

 Height (17.5 cm)

 Diameter (12.5 cm)

products.title: 18W RGB COB DIGITAL PIXEL STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) Yes - IP65 - Uno Lighting
products.description:
COB RGB Digital Pixel LED Strip – 24V, 18W/m, 20 Pixels per Meter

 Please note: Estimated delivery time is 3 days if the item is not in stock.

 This COB RGB Digital Pixel LED Strip delivers smooth, vibrant, and addressable colour lighting for indoor applications. Ideal for creative feature lighting and architectural projects.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 18W per meter

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC (requires 24V driver – not mains powered)

  
 *  Pixel Density: 20 pixels per meter

  
 *  LED Density: 720 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 12mm (IP20) / 14mm (IP65)

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 50mm

  
 *  CRI: >90

  
 *  Length: 5 meters per reel

  
 *  Rating: IP20 (indoor use only)

   Important Information

  
 *  24V driver required – cannot be plugged directly into mains.

  
 *  Listing is for the LED strip only (driver sold separately).

  
 *  Supplied with cables ready to connect or hard-wire by a qualified electrician.

  
 *  Max run: 5 meters continuously to prevent voltage drop and early failure.

  
 *  Handle carefully during installation – physical damage or bending will void warranty.

   Warranty

  
 *  2 Years Standard Warranty

  
 *  3 Years Extended Warranty when installed with Uno Lighting Aluminum Profile
(Recommended for optimal cooling and lifespan.)

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  This strip is not waterproof and must be installed indoors.

  
 *  Avoid bending or twisting the LED strip.

  
 *  Maximum run length: 20 meters total per power feed.

   Disclaimer

 By purchasing, the buyer confirms the product suits their project requirements.
Uno Lighting is not responsible for incorrect installations.
All wiring and setup must be performed by a qualified electrician.

products.title: 5W LED IP44 Mini / Small Bronze & Black Baffle -CRI 90, UGR 10 Anti-glare Fixed Recessed Downlight/ Lamp (Driver included) 4000K Nico
products.description:
This light comes with an individual through-hole driver and includes both White and Black Baffles (inner bezel rings) for versatile styling.

 The Premium 5W LED Mini Baffle Anti-Glare Downlight in Smoky Dark Bronze Bezel offers a luxurious finish and exceptional light control. It features a CCT colour-selectable function via a DIP switch on the transformer, allowing you to choose between Warm White (2800K), Cool White (4000K), and Daylight (6000K) colour temperatures.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 5W

  
 *  Light Output: 430 lumens

  
 *  Colour Temperature: 2800K / 4000K / 6000K (selectable via DIP switch)

  
 *  Beam Angle: 24° (precision reflector lens)

  
 *  Low Glare: UGR ≤10 when both baffles are used

  
 *  CRI: 90 (excellent colour rendering)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor and semi-protected areas

  
 *  Finish: Smoky Dark Bronze Bezel

  
 *  Includes: White & Black Baffles (interchangeable inner rings)

  
 *  Dimmable: Compatible with dimmable driver (sold separately)

   Applications:
Perfect for standard, vaulted, or high ceilings, soffits, receptions, meeting rooms, and entrance foyers. Ideal for accent, ambient, or task lighting.

 Dimensions:

  
 *  Cutout: Ø45mm

  
 *  Height: 35mm

  
 *  Front Bezel: Ø50mm

   Installation Notes:
Supplied with an individual pre-wired through-hole driver that fits neatly through the cutout hole.
For dimmable operation, replace with a compatible dimmable driver.
Installation must be performed by a qualified electrician.

products.title: Bespoke Cut - Up To 20m Super Length Continuous Run Led Cob Strip Ip44 8w 2700k Very Warm White 2700k Very Warm White / 1.00 Metre
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com             


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB 2700K Very Warm White strip.  Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk. Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW.   


 8W per Meter, IP44, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips

 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Very Warm White 2700K, Warm White 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6500K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately). 

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip. 

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 


 


 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. Given the bespoke nature, it may take 3 - 5 working days to prepare the cuts. In case of numerous cuts or potential delays, customers will be notified of any extended preparation times and the expected shipping date.

IP44 COB Strip Installation Caution: All Bespoke strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP44, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

products.title: Fergus Ceiling Light - Brass
products.description:
Delivery - 3 - 5 working days delivery if in-stock with the manufacturer. For out of stock items the lead time will be provided upon ordering.

 Please note a 25% inspection and re-stocking fee on applies to returns on this product.

 Fergus balances simplicity and elegance in the best way imaginable, where all the unnecessary decorations are removed, allowing the shape and materials to stand out. The beautiful luminous spherical glass dome is enclosed by its frame, creating a complete and decorative whole.

Fergus ceiling is a beautiful alternative to the traditional pendant. The three stunning domes in white opal glass provide a nice general light, and simultaneously the lamp does not take up unnecessary space, which is why Grant for example is suitable in the entrance or hallway.

The glass in this lamp is mouth-blown and has been individually hand crafted. Due to this unique process, air bubbles may appear in the glass and the thickness of the glass can also vary. This gives the glass its character and vivid appearance.

  
 * Colour/Finish:Brass 
 * Primary Material:Metal/ Glass 
 * Requires an E14 (Not included) (MAX 2 x 25W) 
 * Height (29.23cm) 
 * Width (14.5cm) 
 * Lenght (69.3cm) 
 * Canopy Dimension (10cm) 
 * Diameter (14.5cm) 
 * Voltage:230 V 
 * Class 2 (Double Insulated) 
 * IP Rating:IP20 
 * Dimmable: Yes

products.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 6500K Day Light / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

products.title: 5W WiFi GU10 Smart Bulb - Smart Home Lighting with App & Voice Control - RGB + Warm/Cool/Daylight & Dimmable - Alexa & Google Assistant Compatible
products.description: The 4.8W Smart WIFI GU10 Lamp is the perfect way to upgrade your home lighting with smart features. This 5W WIFI GU10 Smart Lamp from Uno Lights offers complete control over your lighting, all from your smartphone. Featuring a 36° beam angle, CRI 80, and 345lm, this lamp delivers bright and clear light while being energy-efficient. It's equivalent to a 50-watt halogen bulb. With the built-in WIFI, you can control the lights from anywhere with a simple tap on your phone using the Tuya or Smart Life apps. Enjoy true control from anywhere, turning lights on even when you're away from home. You can even set pre-set scenes for different moods or occasions, using the scene setting options available on the app. Want individual or group control? This lamp has you covered. You can control each bulb independently or group them together for synchronized lighting control. Enjoy the convenience of voice control with Amazon Alexa or Google Assistant. This smart bulb lets you speak to your lights and adjust brightness or turn them on or off with just your voice. Choose from a wide array of 16 million colors to create the perfect ambiance for any occasion or room. You can also select from pure warm white (2700k) for a cozy, relaxing atmosphere or opt for a bright daylight white for a more focused environment. And, you can dim the lights to your preference using the app for customized lighting throughout your home. Scheduling is another key feature. Set timers to automatically turn lights on or off at predetermined times, so you always arrive home to a well-lit space. This convenient feature also gives the impression that you're home when you're not, deterring unwanted visitors. You'll never have to worry about leaving lights on again! Upgrade your lighting to a smart home experience with this powerful and versatile 4.8W Smart WIFI GU10 Lamp.

products.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 6500K Day Light / No - IP20 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

products.description:
The Varilight MKP100 is a 0-100w LED Dimmer Module compatible with the Crompton and various other leading brands

 This dimmer module is compatible with all our  LED Strip dimmable driver ranges

V-Com Intelligent TRIAC Leading Edge Dimming Technology

Technical specification:

  
 * 2 - Way Push Dimmer 
 * Dimensions 52x26x42mm 
 * Back Box Depth - 35mm
  
 * Finish: Matrix 
 * V-Com intelligent TRIAC leading edge dimming technology 
 * Soft start feature and intelligent overload protection 
 * Weight : 50g 
 * Operating Voltage : 220/250v ac 
 * Max Load : LED 100w (Max 10 lamps)

products.description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

products.title: 1W Ella Indirect Eyelid Bezel IP65 Marker Light, Step Light, Mini Downlight, Deck Light, Black/ Antique Brass/ Polished Copper/ Gold/ Bronze/ White
products.description:
Premium 1W High Power Low Glare Marker Light / Downlight

 This premium 1W low glare marker light / downlight is available in a choice of finishes: Eyelid Indirect Black, Antique Brass, Polished Copper, Gold, and White bezel. Choose between 3000K Warm White or 4000K Cool White LED options.

  
 *  Output: 100 lumens

  
 *  Beam Angle: 30° anti-glare

  
 *  Cutout: 25 mm (Front bezel Ø30 mm, Height 26 mm)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP65 waterproof – suitable for indoor and outdoor use

  
 *  Applications: Decks, soffits, cabinets, steps, walkover lighting

  
 *  Sleeve: Optional polycarbonate embedded sleeve available

  
 *  Driver: Supplied with pre-wired inline waterproof driver (fits through cut-out hole)

  
 *  Dimmable: Available with dimmable driver upgrade

   Installation Notes:

  
 *  For outdoor use, the driver must be housed in a waterproof enclosure.

  
 *  Alternatively, remove the inline driver and wire fittings in series to a remote driver.

   Important Information:

  
 *  Some finishes are made to order (lead time: 3–5 working days).

  
 *  Made-to-order items are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

  
 *  Hand-painted bespoke finishes are not recommended for high-traffic or high-wear areas.

products.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 6500K Day Light / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

products.title: Bespoke Cut - Up To 20m Super Length Continuous Run Led Cob Strip Ip44 8w 6500k Day Light 6500k Day Light / 13.00 Metre
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com             


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB 6500K Day Light strip.  Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk. Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW.  


 8W per Meter, IP44, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips

 
 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Very Warm White 2700K, Warm White 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6500K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately). 

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

  Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip. 

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Specifications

products.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 6500K Day Light / Yes - IP65 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

products.title: 20W Marker Light Dimmable Driver Series Wired for Clara, Sofia, MAYA, MIA, Chloe & Ella
products.description:
20W Constant Current Dimmable Driver (Triac Dimming)

 This 20W dimmable driver is designed for indoor use (IP20) and works with our Clara, Sofia, Maya, Mia, Chloe, and Ella marker lights.

 Specifications:

  
 *  Input: 180–240V AC

  
 *  Output: 3–22V DC, 150–700mA (set by DIP switch)

  
 *  Dimming: Triac (phase cut)

  
 *  Size: 140 × 45 × 27 mm

  
 *  Protection: Short circuit, overload, overcurrent

   Installation Notes:

  
 *  Replace the supplied non-dimmable driver.

  
 *  Wire fittings in series (not parallel).

  
 *  Set the correct current via DIP switch before powering on.

  
 *  Incorrect wiring or current setting will cause failure and void the warranty.

  
 *  Installation must be done by a qualified professional.

   Recommendation:
For best dimming, load should be 20–80% of the driver’s capacity.

products.title: 3W Black Bezel Low Level Wash, Low Glare- Step/Wall Lamp /Brick/Path/Deck/Corridor Light, Recessed Light (Driver included) - 3000K Sofia
products.description:
This light comes with an individual through-hole driver for easy installation.

 The 3W LED Low-Level Wash Light / Step & Brick Light in a sleek Black bezel finish is available in Warm White (3000K) and Cool White (4000K). Featuring a slim, low-profile design, it delivers a soft, indirect low-glare illumination that enhances both safety and style.

 Perfect for staircases, corridors, hallways, and walkways, this light provides subtle guidance lighting when overhead lights are off, while also functioning as an architectural or decorative feature marker light.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Colour Temperature: 3000K (Warm White) / 4000K (Cool White)

  
 *  Light Output: 50 lumens

  
 *  Cutout: 70mm × 35mm

  
 *  Front Bezel Dimensions: 80mm (H) × 40mm (W)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor and semi-protected use

  
 *  CRI: 90 – excellent colour accuracy

  
 *  Slim, anti-glare design

  
 *  Optional Aluminium Embedded Box available (recommended for brick or solid wall installations – sold separately)

  
 *  Dimmable option available with compatible dimmable driver (sold separately)

  
 *  Finish: Black

   Applications:
Ideal for steps, staircases, corridors, passageways, and walkways, as well as decorative wall accents in both residential and commercial spaces.

 Installation Notes:
Supplied with an inline non-dimmable waterproof driver that fits through the cutout hole.
For installations in solid or brick walls, use the optional aluminium embedded box (sold separately).
Installation should always be completed by a qualified electrician.

products.title: 10 Metre Reel NEON COB IP67 3000K / 4000K 24V Warm / Cool White Outdoor Top Bend Low Profile Diffuse/Opal Waterproof Sleeve Strip - Luminate up to 10M
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com 


 Product Overview
14W per meter | IP67 | 528 LEDs/m | 10-Meter Reel | 24V | 3000K Warm White | 1540lm/m | CRI 90
Dimensions: W12mm × H4mm × L10000mm
•    3000K Warm White Neon COB Strip Light – top-bend illumination with a low-profile diffused opal sleeve.
•    Features an extra milky cover for smooth, even lighting with no visible LED dots or dark spots.
•    IP67 waterproof rating makes it suitable for outdoor use.
•    Flicker-free operation with all 24V constant voltage drivers; supports PWM dimming.
•    Linear light output with no short-circuit risk.
•    Run up to 5–7 meters powered from one end, or 10 meters when powered from both ends using one driver (looped connection).
Enhance your lighting experience with a soft and diffused glow — perfect for creating uniform illumination without glare or harsh shadows.

 Installation & Usage Notes
•    Maximum Run: 5–7 meters powered from one end, or 10 meters when powered from both ends (looped connection).
•    IP67 Rating: Fully waterproof and suitable for outdoor environments.
•    Handle with Care: Avoid twisting or bending sharply — improper installation may damage the strip and void the warranty.

 Caution
To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, always power both ends (looped) for runs up to 10 meters. Do not power long runs from a single end.

 Terms & Conditions
•    All LED strips are tested before dispatch.
•    Handle carefully — physical damage voids warranty.

 2 Years Warranty.
