products.title: 100W 24V Constant Voltage Super Slim Waterproof IP67 LED Strip Driver L130 x W37 x H20mm
40W Marker Light Dimmable Driver Series Wired for Clara, Sofia, MAYA, MIA, Chloe & Ella
products.description:
40W Constant Current Dimmable Driver (Triac/Phase Dimming)

 This 40W constant current dimmable driver is designed for indoor use (IP20) and is fully compatible with our Clara, Sofia, Maya, Mia, Chloe, and Ella marker light ranges. It offers multiple selectable output currents (300mA–1400mA) via DIP switch, making it versatile for different fittings.

  
 *  Input Voltage: 200–240V AC

  
 *  Output Current: 300mA–1400mA (selectable)

  
 *  Dimming: Works with leading or trailing edge Triac/Phase cut dimmers

  
 *  Protections: Short circuit, overload, and overcurrent protection

  
 *  Cooling: Free air convection

  
 *  Housing: Durable plastic for safe, easy installation

  
 *  Dimensions: 171.5 × 54 × 20 mm

   Installation Notes:

  
 *  For best dimming performance, keep circuit load between 20%–80%.

  
 *  Remove the supplied non-dimmable driver and wire the fittings in series (NOT parallel) to this driver.

  
 *  Installation must only be carried out by a qualified electrician.

products.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 2700K Very Warm White / No - IP20 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

products.title: 3W Low Level Wash, Low Glare- Step/Wall Lamp /Brick/Path/Deck/Corridor Light, Recessed Light Dark Bronze (Driver included) - 3000K Sofia
products.description:
This light comes with an individual through-hole driver for easy installation.

 The Premium 3W LED Low-Level Wash Light / Step & Brick Light is finished in an elegant Smoky Dark Bronze bezel and available in Warm White (3000K) and Cool White (4000K). Designed with a slim, modern profile, this light provides a soft, indirect glow — perfect for enhancing ambience and safety in any space.

 Ideal for circulation areas, corridors, stairways, and walkways, it offers a stylish and functional lighting solution. The subtle anti-glare illumination helps guide movement when overhead lights are off, while also serving as an architectural feature or marker light in residential or commercial interiors.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Colour Temperature: 3000K (Warm White) / 4000K (Cool White)

  
 *  Light Output: 50 lumens

  
 *  Cutout: 70mm × 35mm

  
 *  Front Bezel Dimensions: 80mm (H) × 40mm (W)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor and semi-protected use

  
 *  CRI: 90 – excellent colour accuracy

  
 *  Anti-glare, slimline design

  
 *  Optional Aluminium Embedded Box for brick or solid wall installation (sold separately)

  
 *  Dimmable option available with a compatible dimmable driver (sold separately)

   Applications:
Perfect for stair lighting, step illumination, pathways, foyers, and feature walls, offering both practicality and decorative appeal.

 Installation Notes:
Supplied with an inline non-dimmable waterproof driver that fits through the cutout hole.
For installations into solid or brick walls, use the optional aluminium embedded box (sold separately).
Installation should always be completed by a qualified electrician.

products.title: 15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 4000K Cool White / Yes - IP65 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

products.title: 14mm Clear L Shape Corner Connectors for LED RGBW COB Strip Lights - Secure Clamp Down Design
products.description: The 14mm L Shape / Corner Connectors for LED RGBW COB Strip RGBW L Connectors are the perfect solution for creating sharp, seamless corners in your LED lighting projects. These connectors are designed specifically for 14mm LED RGBW COB strips, ensuring a secure and reliable connection. The unique clamp down design utilizes a strong metal mechanism to firmly connect the connector to the LED strip, eliminating any chance of loose connections or flickering lights. While the connector requires the use of pliers or a similar tool to securely clamp down the connections, this ensures a robust and long-lasting bond. The transparent design of the connector seamlessly blends with any aluminum profile you choose, enhancing the overall aesthetic of your project. Its slim profile allows it to fit into most aluminum profiles, making it a versatile option for various applications. The transparent construction prevents any obstruction of light output, guaranteeing a smooth and consistent glow. This design eliminates the uneven light output often found in other connectors, maximizing the performance of your LED strip and achieving a professional, clean finish. With these Uno Lights L Shape / Corner Connectors, you can easily and reliably create striking, seamless corners in your lighting projects, adding a touch of elegance and sophistication.

products.title: Zeke - Ceiling Lighting
products.description:

 Zeke oozes of exclusivity and glamor. The series combines brushed brass with a pentagon-shaped glass dome adorned with a beautiful diamond pattern that enhances the lustre of the glass and provides a unique light effect in the room. The beautiful glass gives associations to the period with crystal interior, which now again has become a popular decor element.

Zeke ceiling lamp contribute to a stylish and glamorous atmosphere, where the light pattern spreads into the room in the finest way. Use the lamp in the entrance, hallway, bathroom or other places in the home where you don't have the space to mount a pendant in the ceiling.

products.title: Bespoke Cut - Up To 20m Super Length Continuous Run Led Cob Strip Ip44 8w 6500k Day Light 6500k Day Light / 4.50 Metre
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com             


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB 6500K Day Light strip.  Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk. Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW.  


 8W per Meter, IP44, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips

 
 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Very Warm White 2700K, Warm White 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6500K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately). 

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

  Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip. 

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 


 


 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. Given the bespoke nature, it may take 3 - 5 working days to prepare the cuts. In case of numerous cuts or potential delays, customers will be notified of any extended preparation times and the expected shipping date.

IP44 COB Strip Installation Caution: All Bespoke strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP44, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

Bespoke Strip Quotations:
All quotations for bespoke strips are formulated based on the information provided by the buyer.
Upon acceptance of the quote, the buyer affirms that the product specifications align with their requirements.

products.title: Matt Black 2 Gang Dimmer Switch with Antique Brass Knurled Knobs
products.description:
Add a touch of luxury to your interior with our 2 Gang Dimmer Switch, featuring an elegant Matt Black plate with Antique Brass knurled knobs.

 This beautifully designed dimmer switch combines classic brass tones with a modern matte black finish, creating a sophisticated statement piece for any room. The knurled brass knobs provide smooth and precise light control, while the stainless steel faceplate ensures strength and durability.

 The back shell is made from flame-retardant PC material, offering extra safety and reliability. With a rated voltage of 200–250V and wattage up to 500W, this switch perfectly blends function and design to suit both modern and traditional interiors.

 Product Specifications:

 Dimensions: L90 × W86 × D15 mm

 Knob Length: 9.5 mm

 Material: Stainless Steel & Brass

 Rated Wattage: 0–500W

 Rated Voltage: 200–250V

 Colour: Matt Black Plate with Antique Brass Knurled Knobs

 Function: 1 Way Only

products.title: Jessa Dining Room Pendant Light E27 Nordic Simplicity with Clean Lines, Decorative Uplight Effect for a Floating Vibe White - Uno Lighting
Maya Trimless Bezel
products.description:
Maya Trimless Bezel – for 1W Maya High Power Low Glare Marker Light

 The Maya Trimless Bezel is designed for use with the 1W Maya High Power Low Glare Marker Light. Suitable for Maya round bezels and ideal for plasterboard installations.

  
 *  Cutout Size: 35 mm

  
 *  Bezel Dimensions: Ø50.5 × 12 mm

  
 *  Accessories: Includes pin screw fittings for easy removal and replacement

products.title: 1W Ella Indirect Eyelid Bezel IP65 Marker Light, Step Light, Mini Downlight, Deck Light, Black/ Antique Brass/ Polished Copper/ Gold/ Bronze/ White
products.description:
Premium 1W High Power Low Glare Marker Light / Downlight

 This premium 1W low glare marker light / downlight is available in a choice of finishes: Eyelid Indirect Black, Antique Brass, Polished Copper, Gold, and White bezel. Choose between 3000K Warm White or 4000K Cool White LED options.

  
 *  Output: 100 lumens

  
 *  Beam Angle: 30° anti-glare

  
 *  Cutout: 25 mm (Front bezel Ø30 mm, Height 26 mm)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP65 waterproof – suitable for indoor and outdoor use

  
 *  Applications: Decks, soffits, cabinets, steps, walkover lighting

  
 *  Sleeve: Optional polycarbonate embedded sleeve available

  
 *  Driver: Supplied with pre-wired inline waterproof driver (fits through cut-out hole)

  
 *  Dimmable: Available with dimmable driver upgrade

   Installation Notes:

  
 *  For outdoor use, the driver must be housed in a waterproof enclosure.

  
 *  Alternatively, remove the inline driver and wire fittings in series to a remote driver.

   Important Information:

  
 *  Some finishes are made to order (lead time: 3–5 working days).

  
 *  Made-to-order items are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

  
 *  Hand-painted bespoke finishes are not recommended for high-traffic or high-wear areas.

products.title: 2 Metres Trimless 20MM Wide Plaster-In Aluminum LED Profile Channel with Opal Diffuser for LED Strip Lighting 5 x 2 Metres - Uno Lighting
products.description:
20mm Wide LED Trimless / Plaster-in Profile – 2 Metres

 Delivery Note: Estimated delivery is 1–3 working days. If ordered with other products, this item may arrive 1–2 days later than the rest of your order, even though everything is dispatched together.

 Our 20mm Wide LED Trimless Profile is the perfect choice for achieving a sleek, modern, and seamless lighting design. Made from durable 6063 aircraft-grade aluminium, it will not bend or flex during installation, unlike cheaper alternatives.

  
 *  Profile Width: 20 mm

  
 *  Length: 2 metres (6.56 ft)

  
 *  Cover: Opal diffuser for a smooth, flush light finish

  
 *  Material: Strong extruded aluminium for durability and heat dissipation

   Designed to be recessed into walls, ceilings, or other surfaces, this profile blends discreetly into its surroundings, creating the effect of lighting built directly into the architecture. It provides secure housing for LED strips, protects them from damage, and ensures consistent, long-lasting performance.

 Package Includes:

  
 *  1 × 2 metre aluminium channel / profile / extrusion / track

  
 *  1 × 2 metre opal diffuser cover

products.title: RS4 Single Colour Multi Zone Precision Touch Handheld 2.4GHz Wireless Remote Controller
products.description: Multi-Functional Single Colour Remote Control 3VDC (AAAx2). User-friendly interface, easy and simple operation, it can control up to 4 Zones, each zone can be synced with 20 receivers and has ability to set 2 scenes. Pre-set 10 changing modes compatible with 'WIFI' router

products.description:
1 - 10 Metre Extension/Bridge/Gap connector for 10mm Dotless COB Strip LED RGBW(2700K Warm White ) Strip IP44.

  Only suitable for the below type of LED strip (all requirements must be met):

  
 * Dotless LED Strip 
 * 12mm 
 * IP44 
 * RGBW(2700K Warm White)  The cable can be shortened by simply pulling a connector off the end and cutting down the cable, and reinserting the cable to the removed connector.

 This connector can be used as a single end connector too. allowing the creation of a longer cable to make an initial connections to our Dotless COB 12mm IP44 LED strip. In order use this connector as a single end you can simply pull off one connector.

For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com              


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB 4000K Cool White strip.  Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk. Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW. 

 8W per Meter, IP44, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips

 
 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Very Warm White 2700K, Warm White 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6500K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately). 

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service


 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip. 

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 


 


 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. Given the bespoke nature, it may take 3 - 5 working days to prepare the cuts. In case of numerous cuts or potential delays, customers will be notified of any extended preparation times and the expected shipping date.

IP44 COB Strip Installation Caution: All Bespoke strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP44, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

Bespoke Strip Quotations:
All quotations for bespoke strips are formulated based on the information provided by the buyer.
Upon acceptance of the quote, the buyer affirms that the product specifications align with their requirements.
Uno Lighting, as the seller, disclaims any responsibility for products not meeting customer requirements once the order has been placed.

Electrical Information Disclaimer:
Uno Lighting, the seller, cannot provide information about electrical installation or electrical requirements for any lighting or electrical products.
Buyers are strongly advised to consult a qualified professional before contacting the seller regarding project requirements and seeking technical information about installation and maintenance.
By proceeding with a purchase, the buyer acknowledges and agrees to these terms and conditions.

products.title: 5W LED IP44 Mini / Small Black Bezel Black/White Baffle -CRI 90, UGR 10 Anti-glare Fixed Recessed Downlight/Lamp (Driver included) 3000K
products.description:
This light comes with an individual through-hole driver and includes both White and Black Baffles (inner bezel rings) for customisable style and light control.

 The Premium 5W LED Mini Baffle Anti-Glare Downlight in a sleek Black Bezel is designed to provide high-quality, low-glare illumination with a refined finish. It features a CCT colour-selectable function via a DIP switch on the transformer, allowing you to choose between Warm White (2800K), Cool White (4000K), and Daylight (6000K) to suit any setting.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 5W

  
 *  Light Output: 430 lumens

  
 *  Colour Temperature: 2800K / 4000K / 6000K (selectable via DIP switch)

  
 *  Beam Angle: 24° precision reflector lens

  
 *  Low Glare: UGR ≤10 when both baffles are used

  
 *  CRI: 90 for excellent colour rendering

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor and semi-protected areas

  
 *  Finish: Black Bezel

  
 *  Includes: Interchangeable White & Black Baffles

  
 *  Dimmable: Compatible with dimmable driver (sold separately)

   Applications:
Perfect for standard, vaulted, or high ceilings, as well as soffits, receptions, meeting rooms, entrance foyers, or accent lighting in architectural spaces. Suitable for ambient, task, or feature lighting.

 Dimensions:

  
 *  Cutout: Ø45mm

  
 *  Height: 35mm

  
 *  Front Bezel: Ø50mm

   Installation Notes:
Supplied with an individual pre-wired through-hole driver that fits neatly through the cutout hole.
For dimmable operation, replace with a compatible dimmable driver.
Installation must be completed by a qualified electrician.

products.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 6500K Day Light / Yes - IP65 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

products.title: 12W/18W/24W CCT Tri Color Adjustable Wattage LED IP65 Bulkhead Standard
15W HIGH POWER SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP 3000K Warm White / Yes - IP65 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information

 Please note: Delivery time for this item is approximately 3 days if not in stock.

 Product Overview

 This 15W/m COB Dotless LED Strip delivers bright, smooth, and continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-end lighting designs.

 It runs on 24V DC and requires a 24V LED driver (sold separately). This listing is for the LED strip only.

 Each strip is supplied with cables ready for connection. It is not supplied with a plug and must be either fitted with a plug or hard-wired by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 15W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V DC

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 10mm (IP20) / 12mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Cut Points: Every 45.45mm

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 3000K (Warm White), 4000K (Neutral White), 6500K (Cool White)

   Important Information

  
 *  Power Supply Required: Must be powered by a 24V driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run Limit: We recommend a maximum of 5 meters per run to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Installation: Handle carefully during installation to avoid bending or damaging the strip.

  
 *  Waterproof Rating: IP20 is for indoor use only; IP65 is suitable for protected outdoor or damp areas.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years when purchased with an aluminum profile, which helps with cooling and extends LED life.

   Caution & Handling

 Handle with care during installation. Damage caused by bending or excessive pressure will void the warranty.
Always install using aluminum extrusion to maintain performance and longevity.

products.title: 5W Garden Outdoor LED Spike Lights IP65 with 1.5 Meters Cable 3000K Warm White
products.description: This 5W small but might integrated 240v LED spike light packs a punch! Available in 3000K Warm White, 4000K Cool White. Its small and discreet physical size makes it an ideal spike light, as it is easy to hide amongst plants or to fit in a plant pot. Utilizing world leading LED chip manufacturer 'CREE' technology, this 5w spike light gives output to 475 lumens, which provides an excellent level of energy efficiency at 95 lumens per watt (95 lm/w). Its powerful light output creates a very effective architectural style of illumination for plants, flowers, trees, walls, architectural features, etc. This fitting has a built in LED driver so no external driver is required, meaning no hassle of hiding external drivers in waterproof enclosures and no additional outdoor connections will need to be made or managed apart from connecting the cable directly to the mains. This light is pre-wired with a 2 meters cable to make the difficult job of managing outdoor connections much easier, and allows the installer to daisy-chain fittings on a circuit, if they wish to do so. This fitting is manufacturer from a high quality die-cast aluminum for great durability, and is finished in a black weatherproof coating, and is rated at IP65 on the ingress protection table making is watertight. This fitting is supplied with both a wall/post/bollard mounting bracket and an in-ground spike to allow the installer to use one fitting across a landscaping project, for a sense of uniformity in design (allen key included). The specialized bracket design allows the fitting to be vertically position in any direction, so it can swing a full 360°. This fittings has been manufactured to endure harsh weather condition and can operate in temperatures -20° to +55°. Available in a 3000k warm white or 4500k cool white, this fitting can really enhance any any landscaping project. Supplied with a 1 years manufacturers warranty, for peace of mind.

products.title: 10 Metres Reel 8W 2700K Very Warm White /3000K Warm White/4000K Cool White/ 6500k Day Light Reel Super Length Continuous Run LED COB Strip IP44 4000K
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com 


 Product Overview
8W per meter | IP44 | 384 LEDs/m | 10-Meter Reel | 24V | Super Bright LED Strip | 720lm/m | CRI 90
Dimensions: 10mm × 10000mm
Colour Temperature: 2700K Very Warm White / 3000K Warm White/ 4000K Cool White / 6500k Day Light
•    Super Long 10-Meter Reel with Built-in IC — supports up to 20 meters continuous run with almost no voltage drop.
•    Only one-end power input required for up to 20m continuous installation.
•    Provides linear, flicker-free light with no dark spots or short-circuit risk.
•    Compatible with all 24V constant drivers and supports PWM dimming.
•    Seamless, dot-free illumination from high-density LED chips (invisible chip design).
•    Premium commercial-grade LED strip, perfect for professional installations.



 Installation & Usage Notes
•    Maximum continuous run: 10 meters to prevent voltage drop and premature failure.
•    IP44 rating: For indoor use only; not suitable for outdoor or wet environments.
•    Supplied without a plug: Ready for connection or hardwiring by a qualified professional.
•    Handle with care: Avoid bending or pressing on the strip during installation — physical damage may void the warranty.

 Terms & Conditions
•    All strips are tested before dispatch.
•    This IP44 strip is not waterproof; handle gently to avoid damage.
•    Maximum continuous run should not exceed 20 meters when connected in longer runs.

 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB 6500K Day Light strip.  Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk. Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW.  


 8W per Meter, IP44, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips

 2 Years Warranty.

Premium 1W High Power Low Glare Marker Light / Downlight

 *  Output: 100 lumens

 *  For outdoor use, the driver must be housed in a waterproof enclosure.

  
 *  Alternatively, remove the inline driver and wire fittings in series to a remote driver.

   Important Information:

  
 *  Some finishes are made to order (lead time: 3–5 working days).

  
 *  Made-to-order items are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

  
 *  Hand-painted bespoke finishes are not recommended for high-traffic or high-wear areas.

products.title: 3W Black Bezel Low Level Wash, Low Glare- Step/Wall Lamp /Brick/Path/Deck/Corridor Light, Recessed Light (Driver included) - 4000K Sofia
products.description:
This light comes with an individual through-hole driver for easy installation.

 The 3W LED Low-Level Wash Light / Step & Brick Light in a sleek Black bezel finish is available in Warm White (3000K) and Cool White (4000K). Featuring a slim, low-profile design, it delivers a soft, indirect low-glare illumination that enhances both safety and style.

 Perfect for staircases, corridors, hallways, and walkways, this light provides subtle guidance lighting when overhead lights are off, while also functioning as an architectural or decorative feature marker light.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Colour Temperature: 3000K (Warm White) / 4000K (Cool White)

  
 *  Light Output: 50 lumens

  
 *  Cutout: 70mm × 35mm

  
 *  Front Bezel Dimensions: 80mm (H) × 40mm (W)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor and semi-protected use

  
 *  CRI: 90 – excellent colour accuracy

  
 *  Slim, anti-glare design

  
 *  Optional Aluminium Embedded Box available (recommended for brick or solid wall installations – sold separately)

  
 *  Dimmable option available with compatible dimmable driver (sold separately)

  
 *  Finish: Black

   Applications:
Ideal for steps, staircases, corridors, passageways, and walkways, as well as decorative wall accents in both residential and commercial spaces.

 Installation Notes:
Supplied with an inline non-dimmable waterproof driver that fits through the cutout hole.
For installations in solid or brick walls, use the optional aluminium embedded box (sold separately).
Installation should always be completed by a qualified electrician.

products.description:
This fitting is supplied with a pre-wired inline waterproof driver that fits through the cutout hole for easy installation.

 The 3W High Power LED Marker Light / Mini Downlight in Matt White features a CCT colour-selectable connector, allowing you to switch between Warm White (2800K), Cool White (4000K), and Daylight (6000K).

 Designed with a fluted anti-glare bezel and faceted lens, this fitting provides smooth, glare-free lighting, making it an ideal MR11 alternative for modern interiors.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Light Output: 300 lumens

  
 *  Colour Temperature: Switchable (2800K / 4000K / 6000K)

  
 *  Beam Angle: 30° (low-glare fluted design)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor use

  
 *  Bezel Finish: Matt White

  
 *  Driver: Pre-wired inline waterproof driver (fits through cutout hole)

  
 *  Dimmable option available (requires compatible dimmable driver)

   Applications:
Ideal for kitchens (as plinth lights), receptions, meeting rooms, entrance foyers, niches, soffits, and cabinet lighting.

 Dimensions:

  
 *  Cutout: Ø37mm

  
 *  Height: 34mm

  
 *  Front Bezel: Ø45mm

The inline waterproof driver fits through the cutout hole for quick installation.
For use in humid or semi-outdoor areas, the driver must be housed in a waterproof enclosure.

Installation should always be carried out by a qualified professional.

For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com             


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB strip.  Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk. Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW. 

 8W per Meter, IP44, 3000K Warm Whtie, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips 


 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Warm White 2700K, 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6000K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately). 

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Caution: It is recommended to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously to avoid any voltage drop and premature failure. This strip has an IP44 rating, making it unsuitable for outdoor applications.

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip. 

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 


 


 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. Given the bespoke nature, it may take 3 - 5 working days to prepare the cuts. In case of numerous cuts or potential delays, customers will be notified of any extended preparation times and the expected shipping date.

IP44 COB Strip Installation Caution: All Bespoke strip orders undergoes testing before being dispatched. Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged. Please note that the product warranty may become void if the strip is physically bent or damaged during installation. To prevent voltage drop and premature failure, it is advisable to run a maximum of 20 meters continuously. This strip is rated at IP44, rendering it unsuitable for outdoor applications or environments where it is potentially exposed to water.

Bespoke Strip Quotations:
Upon placing the order, the buyer affirms that the product specifications align with their requirements. Uno Lighting, as the seller, disclaims any responsibility for products not meeting customer requirements once the order has been placed.

Electrical Information Disclaimer:
Uno Lighting, the seller, cannot provide information about electrical installation or electrical requirements for any lighting or electrical products.
Buyers are strongly advised to consult a qualified professional before contacting the seller regarding project requirements and seeking technical information about installation and maintenance.
By proceeding with a purchase, the buyer acknowledges and agrees to these terms and conditions.

products.title: 1 - 10 Metre Extension/Bridge/Gap connector for 10mm Dotless COB Strip LED Single Color Strip IP44 Double End Connectors / 7.50 Metre - Uno Lighting
products.description:
1 - 10 Metre Extension/Bridge/Gap connector for 10mm Dotless COB Strip LED Single Color Strip IP44.

  Only suitable for the below type of LED strip (all requirements must be met):

  
 * Dotless LED Strip 
 * 10mm 
 * IP44 
 * Single Colour (2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K)  The cable can be shortened by simply pulling a connector off the end and cutting down the cable, and reinserting the cable to the removed connector.

 This connector can be used as a single end connector too. allowing the  creation of a longer cable to make an initial connections to our Dotless COB 10mm IP44 LED strip. In order use this connector as a single end you can simply pull off one connector.

products.title: 20 Metres Reel 8W 3000K LED COB Strip Super Length Up to 20 Metres Continuous Run Strip IP44 Warm White 3000K Warm White 20M - Uno Lighting
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com 


 Product Overview
8W per meter | IP44 | 384 LEDs/m | 20-Meter Reel | 24V | Super Bright LED Strip | 720lm/m | CRI 90
Dimensions: 10mm × 20000mm
Colour Temperature: 3000K Warm White
•    Super Long 20-Meter Reel with Built-in IC — supports up to 20 meters continuous run with almost no voltage drop.
•    Only one-end power input required for up to 20m continuous installation.
•    Provides linear, flicker-free light with no dark spots or short-circuit risk.
•    Compatible with all 24V constant drivers and supports PWM dimming.
•    Seamless, dot-free illumination from high-density LED chips (invisible chip design).
•    Premium commercial-grade LED strip, perfect for professional installations.



 Installation & Usage Notes
•    Maximum continuous run: 20 meters to prevent voltage drop and premature failure.
•    IP44 rating: For indoor use only; not suitable for outdoor or wet environments.
•    Supplied without a plug: Ready for connection or hardwiring by a qualified professional.
•    Handle with care: Avoid bending or pressing on the strip during installation — physical damage may void the warranty.

 Terms & Conditions
•    All strips are tested before dispatch.
•    This IP44 strip is not waterproof; handle gently to avoid damage.
•    Maximum continuous run should not exceed 20 meters when connected in longer runs.
•    By placing an order, the buyer confirms that product specifications meet their requirements.
•    Uno Lighting is not responsible for issues arising from incorrect product selection or installation.

 Electrical Information Disclaimer
Uno Lighting cannot provide electrical installation guidance.
All installations must be carried out by a qualified electrician.
By purchasing, the buyer acknowledges and agrees to these terms and conditions.

products.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 4000K Cool White / No - IP20 / 10 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

products.title: Strip to Strip Connectors 150mm Wires -For 12mm NEON COB IP67 Outdoor Top Bend Low Profile Diffuse/Opal Waterproof Sleeve Strip
products.description:
IP67 Waterproof COB 12mm Neon Strip (10mm internal width) CONNECTORS for Strip to Strip with 150MM Wires

 One end/connector should be cut off if the connector is being used to joint to a driver or other cable

 This connector features a secure upstanding sharp prongs design which pierce the LED strip when pushed down onto as a means of connecting to the LED connection points.

 To use these connectors you must first feed your LED strip into the transparent lid, aligning your strip copper connector points above the prongs on the white base of the connectors.

 Once properly aligned you must press the transparent lid down firmly into the white base, whilst checking to see the prongs pierce up through the LED strip copper connections point to ensure a solid connection is made.

  In order to maintain the waterproof rating of this strip, where possible all exposed areas of the strip should be filled with a suitable waterproof silicon or glue.

 This can purchased at the following link:

 https://uno-lighting.com/collections/cob-seamless-strip/products/ip67-waterproof-cob-neon-strip-silicon-glue?

products.title: 5W NANO "CUT ANYWHERE" SEAMLESS COB LED STRIP (Furniture & Cabinetry) 3000K Warm White / No - IP20 / 5 meters - Uno Lighting
products.description:
Delivery Information:
Please note that delivery may take approximately 3 days if the item is not in stock

 Product Overview

 This COB Dotless LED Strip Light provides smooth, continuous illumination with no visible LED dots — perfect for modern, high-quality lighting applications.
It operates on 24V and requires a compatible LED driver (sold separately).
This product is the LED strip only and does not include a plug. It is supplied with cables ready for either plug fitting or hard-wiring by a qualified electrician.

 Specifications

  
 *  Power: 5W/m

  
 *  Voltage: 24V

  
 *  LED Type: COB (Dotless)

  
 *  IP Rating: IP20 / IP65

  
 *  LED Density: 528 LEDs per meter

  
 *  PCB Width: 5mm (IP20) / 7mm (IP65)

  
 *  Available Lengths: 5m or 10m rolls

  
 *  Color Temperatures: 2700K / 3000K / 4000K / 6500K

  
 *  CRI: >90 (Excellent color rendering)

  
 *  Cuttable: Can be cut anywhere along the strip

   Important Notes

  
 *  Power Supply Required: All LED strips must be used with a 24V LED driver — do not connect directly to mains power.

  
 *  Continuous Run: Maximum recommended length is 5 meters to prevent voltage drop or early failure.

  
 *  Protection: IP20 version is not waterproof and should only be used indoors.

  
 *  Installation: Handle with care — avoid bending or damaging the strip during installation, as this may void the warranty.

  
 *  Professional Installation Recommended: All electrical connections should be completed by a qualified professional.

   Warranty

  
 *  Standard Warranty: 2 years

  
 *  Extended Warranty: 3 years if purchased with an aluminum profile, which improves heat dissipation and longevity.

   Installation & Safety

  
 *  All LED strips are tested before dispatch.

  
 *  Product warranty is void if the strip is physically damaged or incorrectly installed.

  
 *  IP20 models are for indoor use only and unsuitable for wet or outdoor environments.

  
 *  By placing an order, the buyer confirms that the product specifications meet their requirements.

  
 *  Uno Lighting does not provide electrical or installation advice. Please consult a qualified professional before installation.

products.title: Bespoke Cut IP65 LED Strip 9.6W Warm White / Cool White / Day Light 24V Cool White 4000K / 0.50 Metre - Uno Lighting
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com

              

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip. 

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 Product Specification: 9.6W per Meter, IP65 Waterproof, 120 LEDs per meter, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 1020lm/M, Dimension:10mm x 30000mm. Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. The strip come in 100mm cutting space. Available in Warm White 3000K, Cool White 4000K & Day Light 6500K


 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately).

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 


  

 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. products.title: Emergency Function 12W/18W/24W Adjustable Wattage Tri Color CCT LED IP65 Bulkhead Emergency / 1pc / White Bezel - Uno Lighting
10W Marker Light Dimmable Driver Series Wired for Clara, Sofia, MAYA, MIA, Chloe & Ella
products.description:
10W Constant Current Dimmable Driver (Triac Dimming)

 This 20W dimmable driver is designed for indoor use (IP20) and works with our Clara, Sofia, Maya, Mia, Chloe, and Ella marker lights.

   Features:

 • Constant Current mode output with multiple levels selectable by dip switch

 • Dimming function: Triac/phase cut dimming

 • Work with leading or trailing edge Triac dimmer

 • (ON key: leading edge; 1 key: trailing edge)

 • AC input: 200-240VAC

 • Built-in active PFC function

 • Efficiency up to 75%

 • IP20 design for indoor installation

 • Full protection plastic housing easy installation

 • Protections: Short circuit/ Over load

 • Cooling by free air convection

 • Suitable for LED lighting and moving sign applications

 • Strong compatibility, flicker-free dimming

   Installation Notes:

  
 *  Replace the supplied non-dimmable driver.

  
 *  Wire fittings in series (not parallel).

  
 *  Set the correct current via DIP switch before powering on.

  
 *  Incorrect wiring or current setting will cause failure and void the warranty.

  
 *  Installation must be done by a qualified professional.

   Recommendation:
For best dimming, load should be 20–80% of the driver’s capacity.

 See below diagrams of Series & Parallel wiring

 

 See below a diagram of the current mode range:

 

 Current Settings per Fitting (via DIP switch):

  
 *  Ella Marker Light – 250mA

  
 *  Clara Marker Light – 250mA

  
 *  Maya Marker Light – 250mA

  
 *  Chloe Marker Light – 600mA

  
 *  Mia Low Level – 600mA

  
 *  Sofia Low Level – 600mA

products.title: KNURLED Dark Bronze GU10 UP / DOWN IP44 Indoor/Outdoor Wall Light, Bi-Directional Wall-Mounted, Corrosion-Resistant Die-Cast Aluminium Dark Bronze -
products.description:
*Estimated Delivery Time: 1 Week

 Introducing a modern and versatile lighting solution, this bi-directional wall-mounted cylinder design effortlessly blends functionality with style. Crafted with durable die-cast Aluminum, known for its corrosion resistance, and featuring a tempered glass lens for added robustness and safety, this fixture is designed for both indoor and outdoor settings where a contemporary architectural aesthetic is desired. 

 
The fixture casts light in both upward and downward directions, creating a visually appealing spill of light suitable for various applications such as entryways, doorways, foyers, corridors, balconies, patios, or porches. With an IP44 rating and Class II classification, this light ensures reliability and safety.

Equipped with 2 x GU10 sockets embedded in the body, this fixture supports a maximum wattage of 2 x 35W. Please note that GU10 bulbs are not included with the fixture. Additionally, the dimmability feature allows for flexibility in lighting intensity when using a dimmable GU10 bulb, making it a perfect choice for creating the desired ambiance in your space.


 Light Direction: The fixture casts light in both upward and downward directions, providing a versatile lighting solution.

 IP Rating (Ingress Protection): IP44 rated

 Dimension:  D 63 x 115 x 233 H mm

 Class: Class II

 Construction Material: Constructed with die-cast Aluminum, which is known for its durability and resistance to corrosion

 Lens Material: Features a tempered glass lens, adding robustness and safety to the design

 Design: Wall-Mount Cylinder design with a knurled finish and sleek aesthetic, providing a modern architectural look

 Max Wattage: Supports a maximum wattage of 2 x 35W

 Socket Type: 2 x GU10 sockets embedded in the body. GU10 bulbs are not included with the fixture

 Dimmability: Dimmable when using a dimmable GU10 bulb with the fitting, offering flexibility in lighting intensity

 Bi-directional Light: Designed to provide bi-directional light, making it suitable for various applications such as entryways, doorways, foyers, corridors, balconies, patios, or porches 

 Feature Light: Ideal as a feature light that casts light spill in both upward and downward projections, enhancing the visual appeal of the space

products.title: 12W LED Recessed Ceiling Light Panel - CCT Switchable, IP54, 1200 Lumens
products.description: 12W IP54 CCT Switchable Colour LED Round Circular Downlight Recessed Ceiling Panel Lights (Cutout: 150mm, 1200 Lumen – 3K/4K/ 6K 1pc) Experience the ultimate in versatile and energy-efficient lighting with this 12W round LED downlight. Its sleek, ultra-thin 9mm profile makes it a stylish addition to any ceiling, seamlessly blending into your decor. The 170mm diameter circular design ensures even light distribution, providing 1200 lumens of brightness at an impressive 100 lumens per watt, making it highly efficient and perfect for illuminating a variety of spaces. This recessed-mounted panel features a convenient CCT (Correlated Colour Temperature) switchable design allowing you to effortlessly adjust the colour temperature to match your desired ambiance. Simply use the dip switch located conveniently on the back of the panel to cycle through three distinct colour temperatures: warm white (3000K), creating a cozy and inviting atmosphere; neutral white (4K), offering a balanced and versatile light; and cool white (6000K), delivering a bright, energizing light ideal for task-oriented areas. Its adaptability makes it suitable for a wide array of applications, such as receptions, entrances, foyers, corridors, stairwells and offices. The IP54 rating ensures the fixture is dust-proof and protected against water splashes making it suitable for a range of environments, both indoors and outdoors under sheltered conditions. Designed for seamless integration into existing ceiling infrastructure with a standard 150mm cutout size, installation is straightforward. Powering the downlight is a 24-42V output voltage, working with either dimmable drivers or with our optional emergency driver for enhanced safety in a broader array of installations, which is sold separately. Ensure optimal performance by adhering to safety guidelines and never attempting to change the color temperature setting via the rear switch while the panel remains powered. Switching while powered on risks damaging the light’s internal components and may void any warranties applicable to your product. This ensures lasting performance and exceptional value and ensures this elegant lighting solution will beautifully illuminate your space for years to come, transforming the ambiance effortlessly according to your needs and preferences. The device delivers an even and consistent light spread ensuring adequate and uniform illumination, minimising glare or hot spots common in lower-quality LED options, maintaining aesthetic integrity.

products.title: L Shape/Corner Connectors - For 12mm NEON COB IP67 Outdoor Top Bend Low Profile Diffuse/Opal Waterproof Sleeve Strip
products.description:
L Shape/Corner Connector suitable for 12mm IP67 Neon COB LED strip (10mm internal width).

 This connector features a secure upstanding sharp prongs design which pierce the LED strip when pushed down onto as a means of connecting to the LED connection points.

 To use these connectors you must first feed your LED strip into the transparent lid, aligning your strip copper connector points above the prongs on the white base of the connectors.

 Once properly aligned you must press the transparent lid down firmly into the white base, whilst checking to see the prongs pierce up through the LED strip copper connections point to ensure a solid connection is made.

  In order to maintain the waterproof rating of this strip, where possible all exposed areas of the strip should be filled with a suitable waterproof silicon or glue.

 This can purchased at the following link:

 https://uno-lighting.com/collections/cob-seamless-strip/products/ip67-waterproof-cob-neon-strip-silicon-glue?

products.title: 3W Mia Round Low Level Wash Recessed Step, Stair Light Dark Bronze (Non Dimmable Driver Included) 3W 3000K Round - Uno Lighting
products.description:
This fitting is supplied with a pre-wired inline waterproof driver that fits neatly through the cutout hole for simple installation.

 The 3W Round LED Low-Level Wash Recessed Step / Stair / Brick Light in Dark Bronze finish is available in Warm White (3000K) and Cool White (4000K) options. Its slim, modern design provides a soft and indirect lighting effect, ideal for adding both safety and ambience to your space.

 Perfect for staircases, hallways, pathways, and circulation areas, this light helps guide movement when overhead lighting is off. It can also be used as a stylish architectural feature marker light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.

 Key Features:

  
 *  Power: 3W

  
 *  Colour Temperature: 3000K (Warm White) / 4000K (Cool White)

  
 *  Light Output: 50 lumens

  
 *  Cutout: 35mm

  
 *  Front Bezel Diameter: 45mm

  
 *  Beam Type: Low-level wall wash effect

  
 *  IP Rating: IP44 – suitable for indoor and semi-protected areas

  
 *  CRI: 90 – provides natural, accurate colour rendering

  
 *  Anti-Glare Design for soft, diffused light

  
 *  Slim Profile for a sleek appearance

  
 *  Optional Embedded Sleeve available (recommended for brick or solid wall installations)

  
 *  Dimmable Option available with compatible dimmable driver (sold separately)

   Applications:
Ideal for steps, staircases, corridors, hallways, and walkways, as well as feature or accent lighting in residential and commercial spaces.

 Installation Notes:
Supplied with a pre-wired inline non-dimmable driver that fits through the cutout hole.
For installations into brick or solid walls, an embedded sleeve is recommended (sold separately).
All installations should be completed by a qualified electrician.

products.title: KNURLED Matt Black GU10 UP/DOWN IP44 Indoor/Outdoor Wall Light Bi-Directional Wall-Mounted, Corrosion-Resistant Die-Cast Aluminium Matt Black - Uno
products.description:
Introducing a modern and versatile lighting solution, this bi-directional wall-mounted cylinder design effortlessly blends functionality with style. Crafted with durable die-cast Aluminium, known for its corrosion resistance, and featuring a tempered glass lens for added robustness and safety, this fixture is designed for both indoor and outdoor settings where a contemporary architectural aesthetic is desired.

The fixture casts light in both upward and downward directions, creating a visually appealing spill of light suitable for various applications such as entryways, doorways, foyers, corridors, balconies, patios, or porches. With an IP44 rating and Class II classification, this light ensures reliability and safety.

Equipped with 2 x GU10 sockets embedded in the body, this fixture supports a maximum wattage of 2 x 35W. Please note that GU10 bulbs are not included with the fixture. Additionally, the dimmability feature allows for flexibility in lighting intensity when using a dimmable GU10 bulb, making it a perfect choice for creating the desired ambiance in your space.



 Light Direction: The fixture casts light in both upward and downward directions, providing a versatile lighting solution.

 IP Rating (Ingress Protection): IP44 rated 


 Dimension: 10.90 W x 11.60 E x 18.30 H cm

 Class: Class II

 Construction Material: Constructed with die-cast Aluminum, which is known for its durability and resistance to corrosion

 Lens Material: Features a tempered glass lens, adding robustness and safety to the design

 Design: Wall-Mount Cylinder design with a knurled finish and sleek aesthetic, providing a modern architectural look

 Max Wattage: Supports a maximum wattage of 2 x 35W

 Socket Type: 2 x GU10 sockets embedded in the body. GU10 bulbs are not included with the fixture

 Dimmability: Dimmable when using a dimmable GU10 bulb with the fitting, offering flexibility in lighting intensity

 Bi-directional Light: Designed to provide bi-directional light, making it suitable for various applications such as entryways, doorways, foyers, corridors, balconies, patios, or porches 

 Feature Light: Ideal as a feature light that casts light spill in both upward and downward projections, enhancing the visual appeal of the space

products.title: Bespoke Cut - Up To 20m Super Length Continuous Run Led Cob Strip Ip44 8w 2700k Very Warm White 2700k Very Warm White / 16.00 Metre
products.description:
For a customised strip quotation, kindly email your requirements to sales@uno-lighting.com             


 20 Meters Continuous Run Built in IC super length COB 2700K Very Warm White strip.  Super Long Length, almost no voltage drop for 20 Meters run, it would only need one end power. Linear Light, no dark spot, no short circuit risk. Flicker Free for all 24V constant driver, support PMW.   


 8W per Meter, IP44, 384 LEDs per meter, 20 Meters Reel, 24V Super Bright LED Strip, 720m/M, CRI 90, Dimension:10mm x 20000mm. Seamless Light, Dot free array- continuous light output from LED chips, invisible LED chips

 Long lasting premium LED strip in commercial grade suitable for professional installations. Available in Very Warm White 2700K, Warm White 3000K, Cool White 4000K, Day Light 6500K.

 Dimmable through remote control, Dimmable Drivers or through our smart controller a smart speaker/ device (Sold Separately). 

 All Strips cannot be plug direct to the Mains, it will require an 24V Drivers to power.

 This product listing is for LED strip only, power supply/driver are sold separately.

 This item is not supplied with a plug, it is supplied with cables ready for a plug to be fitted or hard wired into the mains supply by a qualified professional

 2 Years Warranty.

 Warranty extended to 3 Years if purchased with our Aluminum Profile. (For optimal performance and to prevent premature failure, we recommend using aluminum extrusion with all LED strip installations.)

 Fully Bespoke Cutting Service

 We cut the LED strip to your requested length, solder 15cm cable to the end, heat shrink over the leads for protection, and test the LED strip. 

 If you have any specific requirements, such as specific lengths, bridge or corner leads, please email us for a quote.

 As this is a bespoke service, it can take 3 working days to prepare the cuts. If there are many cuts or we think it may take longer than usual, we will try to notify customers of any delays and the expected shipping date. Please note that because this is a bespoke service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable.

 


 


 Terms & Conditions:
Bespoke Cutting and Soldering Service for LED Strip
Bespoke Strip Service, please be aware that, due to the customised nature of this service, orders are non-cancellable and non-returnable, and promotional discounts/offers do not apply. In case of numerous cuts or potential delays, customers will be notified of any extended preparation times and the expected shipping date.

Exercise care and caution when installing the LED strip to avoid damage, as this strip is not waterproof, it does not have a protective layer, so can easily be physically damaged.
